page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: TRACY "MY FATHER'S HOBBIES ARE BEE KEEPING AND WINE MAKING. HE LOOKS AFTER BEES BECAUSE THEY FASCINATE HIM AND WE ENJOY EATING THE HONEY.HE MAKES WINE BECAUSE HE LIKES TO GIVE IT TO PEOPLE WHEN THEY COME TO THE HOUSE." {LEIGHTON "MY MOTHER LIKES TO PLANT {FLOWERS BUT MY FATHER IS MORE {INTERESTED IN GROWING VEGETABLES.THEY {LIKE GARDENING BECAUSE IT HELPS THEM {TO RELAX." NICOLA "MY FATHER LIKES PLAYING DARTS.HE PLAYS IN ONE OF THE PUBS IN GLYNNEATH AND HE HAS WON LOTS OF TROPHIES.HE LIKES PLAYING SNOOKER TOO BUT HE IS NOT GOOD ENOUGH FOR A TEAM." {IAN "MY MOTHER GOES TO BINGO ON A {TUESDAY AND FRIDAY EVENING. SHE DOES {NOT WIN VERY OFTEN BUT SHE ENJOYS {GOING." }
